Text.Page:
Bleakrock's in decent shape, . We can handle things ourselves. Some of the field sites are in more dire need than we are.

Head south of here to Icebase Stalker and report to Chaarisa. They're late checking in, so make haste.

Nunahd worries too much! Yes, we're up to our necks in wendigos, but we're holding our own.

You look like a veteran. At least Nunahd sent someone useful. Tell you what, you speak with Lalash and see what he needs.

Our kind is not meant for this environment. I'm from a bloody desert!

I like the heat. I'm half-tempted to set fire to myself just to warm up my bones.

Yes, we're mining here, but the shards are running out, to say nothing of wendigo hostilities. If you're looking for action, you came to the right place.
